They also have full week and part week enrollments. howToGetIt: To apply, children must be at least 2 years, 9 months old by the following September: - Families (including children) are encouraged to attend our annual “Open House” in late February (see below). - Applications for Admission are due by the end of February. - Enrollment offers are issued in early March. Signed contracts and a nonrefundable tuition deposit are required to secure the position. - Beginning in April, additional students are offered enrollment if space becomes available.
